msContents.summary:
A incomplete copy of the Pāratam, a Tamil version of the Sanskrit Mahābhārata, with a commentary. The bundle contains:
Turōṇaparuvam
Karṇaparuvam
Calliyaparuvam

collation.desc: 1 folio = Title Page. No foliation. Double folio. Shelfmarks on f[1]r. 390 x 30 mm.
1 folio = guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso. 400 x 30 mm.

277 folios = Pāratam. Tamil foliation 324-489, 491-601, sometimes partially lost, often corrected, sometimes unblackened (e.g. f502-f578). Foliation 601 in black pencil. Successive parallel secondary Tamil foliations with gaps, e.g. 1-36 for f324-f369, 1-3 for f370-f372, etc. Sometimes three parallele foliations (e.g. f502 = f47 = f1). 400 x 30 mm.
6 folios = Pāratam. Mūlam only of a portion already in U3 (f579r). Tamil foliation 78-83. Secondary Tamil foliation 579-584, unblackened. 400 x 30 mm.

supportDesc.condition: Poor state of preservation. Many boreholes and truncation. Moisture damages (f424-f425).

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 265 (f[1]r). Presently detached.

binding.p: Original wood covers. 2 strings (one per string-hole).

origin.origDate: Internally dated to the year Āṅkira of the Jovian cycle, that is, Āṅkīraca, that is, CE 1812-1813, 1752-1753, 1692-1693, etc. See colophons: U3, f578r3 & U4, f584r6. Dated to 1762, July 14th, by Vinson & al. (1866-) on the basis of the internal date (Angīrāsa), 1762 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably palaeographical and material analysis arguments).

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine (1912). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 40.
Rosny, Léon de (1868). La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In: Variétés orientales (pp. 177‒224). Paris: Maisonneuve.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. (1866-). Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 62r, no. 245 265.

encodingDesc.p: Transliteration conventions ― Unmarked puḷḷi, ō, and ē restored. Uppercase for initial vowels (in excerpts only). ― Abbreviations ― c = column, f = folio, lf = library foliation, lm = left margin, r = recto, rm = right margin, U = unit (codicological and/or textual), v = verso.
